name: Paul Sauer 2017
description: Easily amongst Cape’s most renowned wines. Cabernet upped to 76% in 2017; Cabernet Franc 17%, Merlot. Classic aromas of cedar and cassis plus vanilla and tobacco from all-new oak that time will integrate. Firm, excellent tannic structure, supple and rich, still with sweet primary fruit plus savoury intensity. Long, long finish points to great concentration. A wine for decades to come.' - Platter's SA Wine Guide 2021, 5* (98/100)
